name: Headmaster Disaster
summary: It's a new school year at Sawfish High School, but with the entrance of a mysterious new principal, it's no longer ordinary. Teachers are acting strangely and students are ferocious and feral. Follow Hazel and Petros as they not only fight for their grades but also their minds and uncover secrets about their world's past. But remember, there's no homework, that is... because you may never come home.
